2126.verse: وَمَن|And whoever|106|130|1012$يَهْدِ ٱللَّهُ|Allah guides|98|146|7012$فَهُوَ|then he (is)|98|146|1591$ٱلْمُهْتَدِ‌ۖ|the guided one;|125|173|10551$وَمَن|and whoever|105|129|1012$يُضْلِلْ|He lets go astray -|146|157|7014$فَلَن|then never|92|114|768$تَجِدَ|you will find|98|120|4073$لَهُمْ|for them|76|98|98$أَوْلِيَآءَ|protectors|89|111|2754$مِن دُونِهِۦ‌ۖ|besides Him.|116|127|4463$وَنَحْشُرُهُمْ|And We will gather them|182|196|10552$يَوْمَ|(on) the Day|105|133|1057$ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ|(of) the Resurrection|159|187|820$عَلَىٰ|on|63|91|52$وُجُوهِهِمْ|their faces -|103|117|10553$عُمْيًا|blind|65|76|10554$وَبُكْمًا|and dumb|84|106|10555$وَصُمًّا‌ۖ|and deaf.|83|105|10556$مَّأْوَٮٰهُمْ|Their abode|98|120|3647$جَهَنَّمُ‌ۖ|(is) Hell;|76|98|1813$كُلَّمَا|every time|90|112|174$خَبَتْ|it subsides,|95|106|10557$زِدْنَـٰهُمْ|We (will) increase (for) them|211|382|10103$سَعِيرًا|the blazing fire.|123|294|3733$

2127.verse: ذَٲلِكَ|That|64|75|28$جَزَآؤُهُم|(is) their recompense|161|183|3078$بِأَنَّهُمْ|because they|110|132|607$كَفَرُواْ|disbelieved|92|114|59$بِـَٔـايَـٰتِنَا|in Our Verses|108|130|408$وَقَالُوٓاْ|and said,|80|91|760$أَءِذَا|"When|62|72|9334$كُنَّا|we are|65|86|4361$عِظَـٰمًا|bones|83|104|10389$وَرُفَـٰتًا|and crumbled particles,|174|195|10390$أَءِنَّا|will we|64|85|9336$لَمَبْعُوثُونَ|surely (be) resurrected|173|183|10391$خَلْقًا|(as) a creation|119|360|10392$جَدِيدًا|new."|74|315|10393$

2131.verse: قَالَ|He said,|73|80|309$لَقَدْ|"Verily,|66|80|3466$عَلِمْتَ|you know|83|97|8646$مَآ|none|52|66|262$أَنزَلَ|has sent down|117|131|2043$هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ|these|82|96|335$إِلَّا|except|65|79|86$رَبُّ|(the) Lord|87|94|6232$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|(of) the heavens|132|146|351$وَٱلْأَرْضِ|and the earth|111|139|352$بَصَآئِرَ|(as) evidence,|116|144|10569$وَإِنِّى|and indeed, I|107|135|2795$لَأَظُنُّكَ|[I] surely think you|147|161|10568$يَـٰفِرْعَوْنُ|O Firaun!|107|304|6654$مَثْبُورًا|(you are) destroyed."|163|360|10570$

2132.verse: فَأَرَادَ|So he intended|120|126|10571$أَن|to|44|56|655$يَسْتَفِزَّهُم|drive them out|117|129|10572$مِّنَ|from|50|62|156$ٱلْأَرْضِ|the land,|92|104|100$فَأَغْرَقْنَـٰهُ|but We drowned him|156|168|10573$وَمَن|and who|76|82|1012$مَّعَهُۥ|(were) with him|124|356|1875$جَمِيعًا|all.|78|310|300$

2133.verse: وَقُلْنَا|And We said|102|119|365$مِنۢ بَعْدِهِۦ|after him|112|146|504$لِبَنِىٓ إِسْرَٲٓءِيلَ|to the Children of Israel,|182|216|3092$ٱسْكُنُواْ|"Dwell|86|120|6937$ٱلْأَرْضَ|(in) the land,|107|124|197$فَإِذَا|then when|90|106|1730$جَآءَ|comes|62|95|4023$وَعْدُ|(the) promise|109|142|10222$ٱلْأَخِرَةِ|(of) the Hereafter,|144|177|978$جِئْنَا|We will bring|103|136|4009$بِكُمْ|you|52|68|2564$لَفِيفًا|(as) a mixed crowd."|157|157|10574$

2126.verse: And whoever Allah guides - he is the [rightly] guided; and whoever He sends astray - you will never find for them protectors besides Him, and We will gather them on the Day of Resurrection [fallen] on their faces - blind, dumb and deaf. Their refuge is Hell; every time it subsides We increase them in blazing fire.

2127.verse: That is their recompense because they disbelieved in Our verses and said, "When we are bones and crumbled particles, will we [truly] be resurrected [in] a new creation?"

2128.verse: Do they not see that Allah, who created the heavens and earth, is [the one] Able to create the likes of them? And He has appointed for them a term, about which there is no doubt. But the wrongdoers refuse [anything] except disbelief.

2129.verse: Say [to them], "If you possessed the depositories of the mercy of my Lord, then you would withhold out of fear of spending." And ever has man been stingy.

2130.verse: And We had certainly given Moses nine evident signs, so ask the Children of Israel [about] when he came to them and Pharaoh said to him, "Indeed I think, O Moses, that you are affected by magic."

2131.verse: [Moses] said, "You have already known that none has sent down these [signs] except the Lord of the heavens and the earth as evidence, and indeed I think, O Pharaoh, that you are destroyed."

2132.verse: So he intended to drive them from the land, but We drowned him and those with him all together.

2133.verse: And We said after Pharaoh to the Children of Israel, "Dwell in the land, and when there comes the promise of the Hereafter, We will bring you forth in [one] gathering."
